snippet: Deputies of the lead negotiators for Iran and the group of six nations in the Iranian nuclear dispute will meet in Turkey on July 24.
abstract: Deputies of the lead negotiators for Iran and the group of six nations in the Iranian nuclear dispute will meet in Turkey on July 24.
lead_paragraph: Deputies of the lead negotiators for Iran and the group of six nations in the Iranian nuclear dispute will meet in Turkey on July 24.

headline.main: Iran: Nuclear Meeting Set for July 24
headline.print_headline: Iran: Nuclear Meeting Set for July 24
